query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Integrated Report: Netherlands
result.description: The Integrated Report of Netherlands will be compiled by TNO after finishing the national cluster workshop series in the Netherlands (Task 3.2) with contribution from the partner Utrecht. This report will contain the reporting on the workshop series and will describe for the Netherlands National Cluster the specific gaps, challenges and opportunities for energy efficiency measures in urban regeneration and the results of the jointly developed strategies for the planning, financing and implementation of energy efficiency measures in urban regeneration.

result.title: Training Activities Report
result.description: A report containing the minutes, sign in sheets and photos of the individual training activities as well as a short description and future recommendations for similar activities. The report will also include the feedback of the participants and a general transnational summary.

category.title: Energy end-use efficiency and energy services

result.title: Collaborative analysis and best practices report
result.description: After the European wide guidance workshop for improved planning, financing and implementation of EE in urban regeneration TNO will compile a report with the results of the collaborative analysis (T5.3) and the conclusions of the workshop. This report will contain best practices for the development of improved strategies for planning, financing and implementing energy policies between the different policy levels illustrated with the lessons learned from the three National Cluster cases. It forms the input for the instructions of the training development in WP4.

result.title: Integrated Report: Croatia
result.description: The Integrated Report of Croatia will be compiled by SWEDES after finishing the national cluster workshop series in Croatia (Task 3.2) with contribution from the partners Osijek, and ASN. This report will contain the reporting on the workshop series and will describe for the Croatian National Cluster the specific gaps, challenges and opportunities for energy efficiency measures in urban regeneration and the results of the jointly developed strategies for the planning, financing and implementation of energy efficiency measures in urban regeneration.

result.title: Integrated Report: Spain
result.description: The Integrated Report of Spain will be compiled by TECNALIA after finishing the national cluster workshop series in Spain (Task 3.2) with contribution from the partners VISESA, Surbisa, EVE. This report will contain the reporting on the workshop series and will describe for the Spanish National Cluster the specific gaps, challenges and opportunities for energy efficiency measures in urban regeneration and the results of the jointly developed strategies for the planning, financing and implementation of energy efficiency measures in urban regeneration
